prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered kneeling pose pouring geometric patterns like starlight, chibi proportions with large translucent geometric cosmic head with unique fractal_wave structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating fractal_wave, dodecahedron, merkaba patterns, styled with Virtue guides influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by wisdom and neutral grey inspired by silver fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and fractal_wave emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns with cosmic spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor USNARDA's profile: 'He who casts down into the depths', Aethyr ICH, Water element, Tarot The Star, Sephirot Binah, Zodiac Aquarius, embodying the essence: 'When USNARDA is near, arrogance is plunged beneath black tides pride suffocates and humility is reborn in the darkness.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered kneeling pose pouring geometric patterns like starlight
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent geometric cosmic head with unique fractal_wave structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating fractal_wave, dodecahedron, merkaba patterns, styled with Virtue guides influences

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who casts down into the depths'
profile_data.essence: When USNARDA is near, arrogance is plunged beneath black tides pride suffocates and humility is reborn in the darkness.
profile_data.angelic_role: Virtue of Abyssal Humility; guides tideborn wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent, multidimensional water-crystal that shifts between liquid and geometric states, representing the liminal nature of Water's transformative power and the boundary between manifest and unmanifest realities
profile_data.color_reasoning: Indigo represents the depth of Binah's wisdom, silver-blue embodies the mysterious fluidity of Water element, reflecting the Aethyr ICH's liminal qualities and the Star card's transcendent illumination
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Dodecahedron represents cosmic consciousness, fractal waves embody water's recursive nature, Merkaba symbolizes interdimensional travel through sacred geometric transformation
